about_the_game:
A VERY cheap and cheerful post apocalyptic romantic visual novel.

Features



37,000 words
12 Endings (6 'good', 6 'bad')

Story


RADS (The Radioactive Apocalypse Dating Simulator) follows a humble college student and part-time Ice Cream Parlour worker who just wants to organise the best college-party of the year and get a date in time for the party...

But after being accidentally frozen in an Ice Cream Parlour walk-in freezer, they awake years later in a post-apocalyptic world they could never have imagined.

The world may have ended... humanity may be gone... but nothing is going to stop our hero from organising this party and getting a date!

Gameplay Notes


This game has no sound.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains some partial nudity and scenes describing foreplay and sexual interaction between consenting adults.

After being accidentally frozen in an Ice Cream Parlour freezer, our college-party-planning hero wakes decades later in a post-apocalyptic world of mutants, robots and monsters... determined to host a party and get a date!
